Description: Papyrus fragment; 5 lines of Coptic text on one side, written along the fibres (recto). Two more extremely faint lines of script can be discerned on the lowest part of the fragment. Mounted with EA 75306, 75304, 75303, 75302, 75301.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118108) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118108)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
